alert.note: Alert for Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued May 20 at 8:42PM MDT until May 21 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...HEAVY, WET SNOW EXPECTED TO CONTINUE OVERSPREADING THE SOUTHEAST AND CENTRAL COLORADO MOUNTAINS, AS WELL AS THE INTERSTATE-25 CORRIDOR, THROUGH TONIGHT AND CONTINUE INTO SATURDAY... .Heavy, wet snow will spread south across the central and southeast Colorado mountains, as well as the Interstate-25 corridor, through tonight and continue into Saturday. The heavy, wet snow will have the potential to cause damage to trees and power lines. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches. * WHERE...Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Feet County. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Heavy, wet snow could cause damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft
